SummaryEnglish: In today’s Japan, "rental" services can deliver an afternoon with a "friend," a "parent," even a fake girlfriend! Kinoshita Kazuya is a 20-year-old failure of a college student. He managed to kiss his girlfriend once, but was dumped after a month. Completely spiteful, Kazuya gets just desperate enough to give it a try. But he quickly discovers how complicated it can be to "rent" an emotional connection… and his new "girlfriend," Mizuhara Chizuru, who’s trying to keep her side hustle secret, will panic when she finds out her real life and Kazuya’s are intertwined in surprising ways! A reckless rom-com filled with love and excitement is about to begin!

1.SummaryEnglish: Chizuru & Asami look back on the first episode of Season 1.

2.SummaryEnglish: Chizuru & Asami look back on the second episode of Season 1.

3.SummaryEnglish: While Chizuru & Asami look back on episode 3 of Season 1, Chizuru asks about the last scene of episode 3...!??

4.SummaryEnglish: While Chizuru & Asami look back on episode 4 of Season 1, Chizuru looks sick, but Asami...?

5.SummaryEnglish: While Chizuru & Rinatsu look back on episode 5 of Season 1, it seems that Rinatsu has something to consider about swimsuit times & hot spring times...?

6.SummaryEnglish: While Chizuru & Rinatsu look back on episode 6 of Season 1, Rinatsu doubts that Chizuru is really dating Kazuya...!??

7.SummaryEnglish: While Chizuru & Rinatsu look back on episode 7 of Season 1, What Rinatsu wanted to do when dating...!??

8.SummaryEnglish: While Chizuru & Rinatsu look back on episode 8 of Season 1, Rinatsu was told by Kazuya that "Christmas is a family trip"...

9.SummaryEnglish: While Chizuru & Rinatsu look back on episode 9 of Season 1, It was Rinatsu who started a part-time job at the same karaoke shop as Kazuya...!??

10.SummaryEnglish: While Chizuru & Sumi look back on Episode 11 of Season 1, It's finally Sumi that appeared in the main story...!??

11.SummaryEnglish: The final episode of the mini anime where Chizuru, Asami, Rinatsu, & Sumi delivers a message to everyone.

12.TitleEnglish: She Will Rent Halca - Chibi Short Special 1
12.SummaryEnglish: The singer Halca (From the End theme song) is having dating trouble!?? She calls for advice from the expert Chizuru...? She also talks about her new CD coming out soon.

13.TitleEnglish: She Will Rent The Peggies - Chibi Short Special 2
13.SummaryEnglish: The band The Peggies (From the opening theme song) meet Chizuru for a special collaboration!

14.SummaryEnglish: Part 1: This episode you go on an aquarium date with Chizuru

15.SummaryEnglish: Part 2: This episode you continue your date with Chizuru & go shopping

16.SummaryEnglish: This episode's date takes you on a VR attraction with Chizuru

17.SummaryEnglish: This episode's date takes you to a Café with Chizuru

18.SummaryEnglish: This episode you go on an after-school date with Asami

19.SummaryEnglish: This episode's date takes you to an accessory shop with Asami

20.SummaryEnglish: This episode features a date at a Café with Asami

21.SummaryEnglish: This episode's date takes you to a Pub with Asami

22.SummaryEnglish: Part 1: This episode is the 1st part of a date with Rinatsu to Harajuku. You will meet her at the station

23.SummaryEnglish: Part 2: Continuing your Harajuku date with Rinatsu, time to get pancakes!

24.SummaryEnglish: Part 3: The 3rd stop on your Harajuku date with Ruka is a general store

25.SummaryEnglish: Part 4: To finish off your Harajuku date with Rinatsu it's time for the Photo Booth

26.SummaryEnglish: Part 1: For this date you are going to a Shopping Mall with Sumi. Now it's time to meet up!

27.SummaryEnglish: Part 2: Continuing your Shopping Mall date with Sumi, you go on a double date to a movie theater

28.SummaryEnglish: Part 3: For the 3rd part of your Shopping Mall date with Sumi it's time to hit up the food court

29.SummaryEnglish: Part 4: To end your Shopping Mall date with Sumi your 4th stop is the general store

30.SummaryEnglish: Part 1: Your 2nd date with Chizuru Suwon begins on a Roller Coaster at an amusement park

31.SummaryEnglish: Part 2: You continue your Amusement Park date with Chizuru Suwon, your 2nd stop is to grab some lunch

32.SummaryEnglish: Part 3: For the 3rd stop on your Amusement Park date with Chizuru Suwon you take her to a haunted house

33.SummaryEnglish: Part 4: The last stop on your date to the Amusement Park with Chizuru Suwon brings you on the Ferris Wheel

34.SummaryEnglish: Part 1: For your 2nd date with Asami Nanami it's a trip to Yokohama! You'll start from the Red Brick Warehouse

35.SummaryEnglish: Part 2: It's your lucky day on your date to Yokohama with Asami Nanami. Your 2nd stop is a Trick Art Museum

36.SummaryEnglish: Part 3: Luck is on your side as Asami Nanami & you continue your Yokohama date. The next stop is a Fortune Teller. Do you believe in fortune-telling?

1.SummaryEnglish: Jilted and heartbroken, 20-year-old Kinoshita Kazuya turns to Diamond, a Rent-A-Girlfriend app that leads him to a fateful encounter with Mizuhara Chizuru, one of the talents on offer.

2.SummaryEnglish: Immediately after deciding not to rely on pretend dating anymore, Kazuya is hit with a triple whammy of reveals: Chizuru not only goes to his college but lives next door to him, and his grandmother is coming to visit and wants to see her.

3.SummaryEnglish: Kazuya barely has time to deal with the fallout of the situation in the pub before the gang heads off on a short trip to Izu, where they run into someone unexpected.

4.SummaryEnglish: Mami's plan comes to a head as Kazuya decides to set the story straight, to mixed reactions.

5.SummaryEnglish: The aftermath of the ferry incident signals a clear shift in Kazuya's feelings. Meanwhile, there's a conspiracy brewing at the hot springs inn he and his family decide to visit.

6.SummaryEnglish: Having to spend a night in the same room with Chizuru sends Kazuya's heart and mind racing. Meanwhile, Kuribayashi Shun has a surprise in store...

7.SummaryEnglish: While Kazuya desperately tries to get Ruka to promise she won't reveal his secret, she tells him her own.

8.SummaryEnglish: Christmas rolls around with Kazuya not having met Chizuru for ages, and he sees something he never wanted to see.

9.SummaryEnglish: Ruka is hellbent on knowing the full story behind Kazuya and Chizuru's relationship, and once she does she decides to take action.

10.SummaryEnglish: Kazuya learns that Kuribayashi's been down in the dumps and tries to figure out how he can help him.

11.SummaryEnglish: On Chizuru's request, Kazuya goes on a practice date with Sumi, another rental girlfriend. Will he actually be able to help her and stay out of trouble while he's at it?

12.SummaryEnglish: Chizuru and Mami go on an awkward rental date unaware that Kazuya has seen them together. How can Chizuru handle this situation?

1.SummaryEnglish: As Mizuhara looks set to quit the rental girlfriend business, Kazuya goes to watch a play, one that could be pivotal to their relationship.

2.SummaryEnglish: As the fallout from the play becomes clear, things go back to normal between Mizuhara and Kazuya, until...?

3.SummaryEnglish: Mizuhara has lost the key to her apartment and comes to Kazuya for some reason... and she's not the only unexpected visitor!

4.SummaryEnglish: Kazuya has barely dealt with the aftermath of Mami's visit when he gets another aggressive visitor!

5.SummaryEnglish: Kazuya tries to clear the misunderstanding Chizuru is under, all while enlisting Sumi's help to get her a fitting birthday present.

6.SummaryEnglish: As Kazuya wonders if his birthday gift was good enough, he and Chizuru find themselves in a crisis in the form of a boozer.

7.SummaryEnglish: Kazuya wakes up with the worst hangover ever and struggles with his fragmented memories. Meanwhile, someone finds out about his workplace and decides to make an appearance...

8.SummaryEnglish: Kazuya decides to spend his all-day date with Mizuhara reclaiming his lost youth... in a very peculiar fashion.

9.SummaryEnglish: When Nagomi hears that Chizuru's birthday has already passed, she decides to throw a combined party for both her and Kazuya, and she refuses to take no for an answer!

10.SummaryEnglish: Kazuya can barely process Ruka's actions when Nagomi decides to drop another bomb on the party.

11.SummaryEnglish: Kazuya has hardly begun to process the fallout from his birthday when he gets asked to go on another practice date with Sumi, this time with her taking the lead!

12.SummaryEnglish: Chizuru reflects on her journey to get her here, and Kazuya acts on his idea to help her.

1.SummaryEnglish: Kazuya and Chizuru have decided to make a movie together so that Granny Sayuri can see it. That's all well and good, but now they have to sit down and work out all the details.

2.SummaryEnglish: Ruka demands an explanation from Kazuya and Chizuru, and Mini overhears it all going down! What will she do with this information?

3.SummaryEnglish: With the momentum of the crowdfunding campaign stalling, Kazuya must turn to Mini, who happens to be an expert on the matter!

4.SummaryEnglish: Mini's earnest appeal makes things awkward. Meanwhile, Umi makes a request in return for retweeting the campaign.

5.SummaryEnglish: Filming for the movie begins, and seeing her act in the flesh, Kazuya realizes that Chizuru exists in a whole different dimension from him. Meanwhile, Mini is hatching a plot of her own.

6.SummaryEnglish: Kazuya and Chizuru end up at a ski resort, finding themselves having to shoot the final scene for the movie all on their own. Chizuru decides she has something to say to Kazuya.

7.SummaryEnglish: It's Ruka's birthday, and Kazuya has to stay true to his word and grant her anything she desires. But what does she want, really?

8.SummaryEnglish: Sayuri tags along with Kazuya and Chizuru as they scout out the cinema they'll be screening their movie in, and it brings back memories for her.

9.SummaryEnglish: With Sayuri's prospects looking bleak, Kazuya pulls off the only thing he can do for Chizuru and her.

10.SummaryEnglish: Not knowing what to do, Kazuya looks to good old Sumi for advice. She decides to take him on a trip to help clear his mind.

11.SummaryEnglish: Kazuya decides to rent Chizuru out for an entire day and puts together a date plan to help cheer her up. Will he be successful?

12.SummaryEnglish: Seeing Chizuru overcome with grief, Kazuya decides to give her an outlet and sees the ensuing moment as a big change in their relationship.

1.SummaryEnglish: Summer break is over, and routine returns to Kazuya's life. Something he needs to fix, and fast.

2.SummaryEnglish: Kazuya suggests that he and Chizuru get lunch together. How will she take it?

3.SummaryEnglish: Chizuru and Kazuya are invited to a party in the super-fancy area of Daikanyama.

4.SummaryEnglish: Kazuya has his mind set on making his move, and Chizuru has realized something too.

5.SummaryEnglish: Mami finally confronts Chizuru. How will this explosive situation turn out?

6.SummaryEnglish: It's time for the Kinoshita tradition—a two-night, three-day trip to Spa Resort Hawaiians!

7.SummaryEnglish: The Hawaiians stay begins in absolute chaos as Mami has joined the fray!

8.SummaryEnglish: Chizuru and Kazuya deal with a little incident, blissfully unaware of the moves Mami is making.

9.TitleEnglish: For My First Time and Girlfriend
9.SummaryEnglish: Ruka has her doubts about this trip, and her doubts are amplified by the conversations she has!

10.SummaryEnglish: Chizuru and Ruka have run-ins with the Kinoshita family women.

11.SummaryEnglish: Mami confronts Chizuru and urges her to make a decision.

12.SummaryEnglish: Kazuya's filled with guilt after Nagomi's display of gratitude, and Chizuru has a decision to make with Mami.
